text: Robert A. Butterworth Jr. (born August 20, 1942) is an American lawyer and politician. He was the 33rd Florida Attorney General from 1987 to 2002. He was a member of the Democratic Party. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Bob Butterworth profiled at ITFlorida.com Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Florida attorneys general Category:Politicians from New Jersey Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from New Jersey Category:People from Passaic, New Jersey
title: Bob Butterworth
